scripts.build: swc src --only **/*.ts --out-dir dist && node -e '!fs.existsSync(".sentryclirc") || process.exit(1)' || pnpm sentry:sourcemaps
scripts.build:debug: swc --source-maps=true src --out-dir=dist && node -e '!fs.existsSync(".sentryclirc") || process.exit(1)' || pnpm sentry:sourcemaps
scripts.sentry:sourcemaps: sentry-cli sourcemaps inject --org mmmm-q0 --project fixup-twitter-link ./dist && sentry-cli sourcemaps upload --org mmmm-q0 --project fixup-twitter-link ./dist

engines.npm: This project is configured to use pnpm
